title: Fizz Buzz
description:
Given an integer n, return a string array answer (1-indexed) where:

  answer[i] == "FizzBuzz" if i is divisible by 3 and 5.
  answer[i] == "Fizz" if i is divisible by 3.
  answer[i] == "Buzz" if i is divisible by 5.
  answer[i] == str(i) if none of the above conditions are true.

Example 1:
  Input: n = 3
  Output: ["1","2","Fizz"]

Example 2:
  Input: n = 5
  Output: ["1","2","Fizz","4","Buzz"]

Example 3:
  Input: n = 15
  Output: ["1","2","Fizz","4","Buzz","Fizz","7","8","Fizz","Buzz","11","Fizz","13","14","FizzBuzz"]
check_function:
def check(candidate):
    assert candidate(3) == ["1","2","Fizz"]
    assert candidate(5) == ["1","2","Fizz","4","Buzz"]
    assert candidate(15) == ["1","2","Fizz","4","Buzz","Fizz","7","8","Fizz","Buzz","11","Fizz","13","14","FizzBuzz"]
    assert candidate(1) == ["1"]
    assert candidate(30)[-1] == "FizzBuzz"
    assert len(candidate(100)) == 100
    assert candidate(6) == ["1","2","Fizz","4","Buzz","Fizz"]
    assert candidate(10)[8] == "Fizz"
    assert candidate(10)[9] == "Buzz"
